TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ClaimTypeRequirement extends System.Object

summary.span: 指定希望出现在联合凭据中的必选和可选的声明类型。

span.span: Specifies the types of required and optional claims expected to appear in the federated credential.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在联合方案中，服务规定有关传入凭据的要求。In a federated scenario, services state the requirements on incoming credentials. 例如，传入凭据必须具有某组声明类型。For example, the incoming credentials must possess a certain set of claim types. 此要求出现在安全策略中。This requirement is manifested in a security policy. 当客户端从 security token service (例如，CardSpace) 请求安全令牌时，它会将要求放置在令牌请求中，以便 security token service 可以发出相应的安全令牌。When a client requests a security token from a security token service (for example, CardSpace), it puts the requirements into a token request so that the security token service can issue the security token that satisfies the requirements accordingly. ## Examples 下面的代码将两个声明类型要求添加到安全绑定。The following code adds two claim type requirements to a security binding. [!code-csharp[S_UEClaimTypeRequirement#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueclaimtyperequirement/cs/client.cs#1)] 下面的配置文件与前面的代码一起使用。The following config file is used with the preceding code. [!code-xml[S_UEClaimTypeRequirement#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueclaimtyperequirement/common/app.config#101)]

summary.span: 获取构造函数中指定的声明类型。

span.span: Gets the claim type that was specified in the constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性是一个用于定义声明类型的 URI。This property is a URI that defines the type of a claim. 例如，若要从网站上购买产品，用户必须提供具有足够信用额度的有效信用卡。For example, to purchase a product from a Web site, the user must present a valid credit card with a sufficient credit limit. 声明类型将为信用卡 URI。The claim type would be the credit card URI. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何获取此属性。The following code shows how to get this property. [!code-csharp[S_UEClaimTypeRequirement#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueclaimtyperequirement/cs/client.cs#2)]

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示声明是否可选。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the claim is optional.

value.span: 如果该类实例指定声明是可选的，则为 ；如果它指定声明是必选的，则为 。

span.span: if this instance of the class is for an optional claim; if it specifies a required claim.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性的一个示例就是服务请求一些非必要信息的情况。An example of how to use this property is the scenario in which the service asks for some information but does not require it. 例如，您必须输入名、姓和地址，但是可以选择是否输入电话号码。For instance, you are required to enter your first name, last name, and address, but your phone number is optional. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何获取此属性。The following code shows how to get this property. [!code-csharp[S_UEClaimTypeRequirement#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueclaimtyperequirement/cs/client.cs#2)]
